section.title: Major features
Student feedback
section.para: Student feedback has gone from being a minor feature in the portal to a first class part of onCourse. You can now set up student feedback as part of your Data Collection rules. In this first release student feedback is fixed to just four ratings plus a short answer field, but we'll be rolling out custom fields and links to third party tools like SurveyMonkey for really complex forms.
Because we've linked this to Data Collection, your VET courses can have additional surveys for employers several months later, while other courses might have a survey after each session.

Just as importantly, feedback can be marked by you to be marketing worthy. This means that with the addition of a small component to your site you can have testimonials completely integrated into your workflow.

section.title: New editor
section.para: Our new editor has now replaced the old CMS. It is more powerful and much easier to use. Built on a modern React framework it allows us to more quickly add new functionality to your site. Already you now have the ability to roll back to previous site versions as well as suppress certain pages from your sitemap, and you can now edit the redirects in WebDav.

section.section: Editor APIThe new editor now also has an API. This is a very important step forward in the refresh of our technology stack. You can script actions to do anything that the editor UI itself can do, right through to publishing your site.
